name: 魏暘
objective: An introductory course in thermodynamics of chemical engineering is offered in this course. Topics include the first and second laws of thermodynamics, open and closed systems, with additional emphasis on thermodynamic properties in phase equilibrium of solutions, general correlations with real fluids, and multi-component systems.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction of Thermodynamics 
Week 2-3: Phase Diagrams of Pure Fluids
Week 4-5: Energy and the First Law
Week 6-8: Entropy and the Second Law
Week 9: Mid-term exam
Week 10-12:Properties of Solution 
Ｗeek 13-15: Phase Equilibrium
Week 16-17:Flow Process
Week 18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
1. Class performance/absence/homework 50%
2. Midterm exam 25%
3. Final exam 25%
